name: FIFA Mobile
summary:
Build your ultimate team with selections from the biggest leagues, best teams and over 15.000 Soccer Star Players, including: Premier League (Trent Alexander-Arnold, Phil Foden & Christian Pulisic), LaLiga Santander (David Alaba & João Félix), Bundesliga (Jude Bellingham) and Ligue 1 Uber Eats (Kylian Mbappé).

Experience enhanced visuals, kick it in new, upgraded soccer stadiums and score a goal to the cheers of fans with realistic stadium SFX and live on-field audio commentary. Dribble past defenders in style, thread an inch-perfect pass, and score a belter top corner, all now with high fidelity player rendering. Build, train and manage soccer legends to level up your Ultimate Team!
